title: Corporate Restructuring
description: This course examines the finance, economics, law, and business strategies that underlie major corporate restructuring transactions. Topics include valuation, acquisitions, divestitures, and high-leveraged transactions.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MGT 3062 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MGT 3078 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
